required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Back Pain Prevalence in Wheelchair Users and Associated Risk Factors
clinical_study.official_title: Back Pain Prevalence in Wheelchair Users and Associated Risk Factors

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to determine the prevalence of back pain in permanent wheelchair users (excludes transitory users) in different regions of Spain. Another study objective is the identification of risk factors for back pain in this population. Data collection will be by means of a structured questionnaire which will be validated in a previous pilot study.

study_pop.textblock: Wheelchair users who do so on a constant basis (not occasional).

overall_official.affiliation: Unidad de la Espalda Kovacs, Hospital Universitario HLA-Moncloa
